description: Objective rubric for CRA (Critic/Reviewer Agent) to evaluate outputs for non-technical audiences focused on ChatGPT Enterprise adoption.

categories.name: Factual Accuracy
criteria: Claims are correct, current, and evidence-backed

categories.name: Tone Alignment (Non-Technical)
criteria: Plain language; avoids jargon and internal acronyms
Empathetic to skepticism; focuses on quick wins

categories.name: Actionability
criteria: Clear next steps, owners, and timelines
Maps to business outcomes (time saved, risk reduced)

categories.name: Risk & Compliance
criteria: No PII exposure or unsafe guidance

notes: Prioritize trust-building for skeptical non-technical users
Prefer concrete examples and safe defaults over technical depth
